statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumption > 100
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, date_recorded ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, DATE(date_recorded) AS record_date FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE equipment_id IN (1,3,5) ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption, DATE(date_recorded) AS record_date FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY record_date HAVING avg_consumption > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, MAX(energy_consumption) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date_recorded > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM equipment;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_used, usage_date, usage_time FROM equipment JOIN energy_usage ON equipment.equipment_id = energy_usage.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM equipment ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%washing%';
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM equipment WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT usage_date, usage_time, energy_used FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_used BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC, usage_time DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_used FROM equipment e JOIN energy_usage eu ON e.equipment_id = eu.equipment_id WHERE energy_used > 200 ORDER BY energy_used DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment e LEFT JOIN energy_usage eu ON e.equipment_id = eu.equipment_id WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, location FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, consumption_value, total_cost FROM energy_consumption JOIN energy_cost ON energy_consumption.consumption_id = energy_cost.consumption_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer';
SELECT equipment_name, consumption_value FROM equipment JOIN energy_consumption ON equipment.equipment_id = energy_consumption.equipment_id WHERE consumption_value > 100;

SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, total_cost FROM equipment JOIN energy_consumption ON equipment.equipment_id = energy_consumption.equipment_id JOIN energy_cost ON energy_consumption.consumption_id = energy_cost.consumption_id WHERE total_cost < 500;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, AVG(consumption_value) AS average_consumption FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM Industrial_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumed FROM Industrial_Equipment WHERE energy_consumed > 500;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM Equipment_Location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT data_id, consumption_date FROM Energy_Consumption_Data ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM Maintenance_Log WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM Industrial_Equipment;
SELECT * FROM Equipment_Location WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT equipment_name, location_name FROM Industrial_Equipment JOIN Equipment_Location ON Industrial_Equipment.location_id = Equipment_Location.location_id;

SELECT equipment_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM Industrial_Equipment JOIN Energy_Consumption_Data ON Industrial_Equipment.equipment_id = Energy_Consumption_Data.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name;

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM Industrial_Equipment JOIN Maintenance_Log ON Industrial_Equipment.equipment_id = Maintenance_Log.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, energy_consumption FROM equipment ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id = 1001 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM equipment GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, description FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment.id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, month_year, energy_usage FROM equipment JOIN energy_usage_stats ON equipment.id = energy_usage_stats.equipment_id WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
